Description: The Student comes but does not participate in the class whatsoever
The Student comes but participates in less than half of the class
The Student participates in the whole class but barely gets through each section
The Student participates in the whole class, whilst actively pushing and trying to follow along with directional changes
The Student pushes through the whole class and gives his all
The Student pushes through the whole class and aggresively asks questions showing interest for more
The Student pushes through and is a role model for the whole class. Shows perserverance and hard-work throughout
